title: The Kink Asylum Book 1: Medical Play, Doctor, BDSM, CNC, Dark and Taboo: A Horror Asylum Erotica
description: The Kink Asylum Book 1 follows co-ed Catherine's sexual journey in the basement of crumbling Richwood Asylum, where she's awakened to pleasure, unlike anything she's ever known in her existence. One minute she's studying for finals and the next her new Master is making her beg for it. She falls down a rabbit hole of medical fetish, group sex, and a lesbian encounter that twists her in ways that will make sure she's never the same again.
author: Elena K. Salvatore
